name: Character Carnage
description:
Controls :

Keyboard Player :

2 - Join Session

1 - Leave Session

WAD - Move

Space - Jump - FallJump - DoubleJump

S - Crouch

Enter - Slide

Xbox Pad Players :

Start - Join Session

Back - Leave Session

Left Analog - Move

Left Analog Down / B- Crouch

A - Jump - FallJump - DoubleJump

X - Slide

GOOD LUCK
